verses.verse: God, <WH430> you have rejected <WH2186> us. <WH6555> You have broken us down. <WH599> You have been angry. Restore us, <WH7725> again.
You have made the land <WH776> tremble. <WH7493> You have torn <WH6480> it. <WH7495> Mend its fractures, <WH7667> for it quakes. <WH4131>
You have shown <WH7200> your people <WH5971> hard things. <WH7186> You have made us drink <WH8248> the wine <WH3196> that makes us stagger. <WH8653>
You have given <WH5414> a banner <WH5251> to those who fear <WH3373> you, <WH5127> that it may be displayed because <WH6440> of the truth. <WH7189> Selah. <WH5542>
So that your beloved <WH3039> may be delivered, <WH2502> save <WH2502> with your right hand, <WH3225> and answer us. <WH6030>
God <WH430> has spoken <WH1696> from his sanctuary: <WH6944> "I will triumph. <WH5937> I will divide <WH2505> Shechem, <WH7927> and measure out <WH4058> the valley <WH6010> of Succoth. <WH5523>
Gilead <WH1568> is mine, <WH4519> and Manasseh is mine. <WH669> Ephraim also is the defense <WH4581> of my head. <WH7218> Judah <WH3063> is my scepter. <WH2710>
Moab <WH4124> is my wash basin. <WH5518> I will throw <WH7993> my shoe <WH5275> on Edom. <WH123> I shout in triumph <WH7321> over Philistia. <WH6429>"
Who will bring <WH2986> me into the strong <WH4692> city? <WH5892> Who has led <WH5148> me to Edom? <WH123>
Haven't <WH430> you, God, rejected us? <WH430> You don't go out with our armies, God.
Give <WH3051> us help <WH5833> against the adversary, <WH6862> for the help <WH8668> of man <WH120> is vain. <WH7723>
Through God <WH430> we shall do <WH6213> valiantly, <WH2428> for it is he who will tread down <WH947> our adversaries. <WH6862>
